title: Why did my contacts suddenly disappear? How can I get them back? I've...
content: Hello, i experienced something very strange this afternoon; i was chatting on WhatsApp one minute and the next minute some of my contacts are gone. That is, just the numbers show without the people's names. Ive re strated my phone a couple of times, refreshed my WhatsApp contact list,and even restored my contacts from my google account but the names just wouldnt reappear. How can i solve this problem please?
